mean_cn: adj. 占主导地位的；显著的；占优势的
mean_en: more important, powerful, successful, or noticeable than other people or things
word_etyma: pre ….前的，预先 + domin 主人 + ant 表示属于...的、具有...性质的 → a.占主导地位的,显著的,流行的
sentence: The white pieces were predominant on the chess board, so I lost the game.
sentence_trans: 棋盘上白色棋子占上风（主导地位），所以我输掉了比赛。
